lead_paragraph: The Center for Excellence in Higher Education says the Education Department is trying to put its colleges out of business by failing to classify them as nonprofit.

headline.print_headline: College Group Sues U.S.,  Saying It’s Political Victim
headline.main: College Group Sues U.S., Saying It’s Target of Political Agenda

snippet: The Center for Excellence in Higher Education says the Education Department is trying to put its colleges out of business by failing to classify them as nonprofit....
abstract: Center for Excellence in Higher Education, owner of chain of colleges, files suit against federal Education Dept, accusing it of pursuing political agenda; charges department with trying to put Center out of business by not classifying its colleges as nonprofit educational institutions, which limits their access to federal student aid money.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Center for Excellence in Higher Education
